analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 23.11. Kusalattika, Parittattika🔽Nakusalaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽(Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nakusalaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: kusala ttika paritta ttika  na kusalam na parittam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ parittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca  na kusalam na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: .. The Kusalattika, Parittattika🔽With a wholesome, limited, phenomenon as condition, an indeterminate, limited, phenomenon arises, a root-cause condition.

original: Nakusalaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na appamāṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ appamāṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
